page.title: 01General Description
page.content: The D-block 02400555 is situated in the South-West of Scotland. Essentially this is a rural area which is covered by farmland. The type of{ {farming}within the block is mainly{ {dairy}or{beef,}although most farms have some sheep, and most of them grow crops of some sort. In the south-east corner of this block, there is the village of{Wigtown.}Most of the village is included in the block, although some of it will fall into the next D-block. This village is an attractive village which is made up of residential property, apart from the village square which has numerous commercial properties. The main roads in this D-block are the A714, B7005 and the B733.
